page.title: 02LIVING IN HELMSHORE.
page.content:
Life in Helmshore is very pleasant. It is fairly quiet, with only one motorway;the M66. Helmshore area holds about 6 schools. Most of the schools are primary schools. It also contains several firms on Holcombe Road.
There are two main attractions in Helmshore;Higher Mill and the Tor. Higher Mill used to be a woollen mill, but now it is a museum. The granite Tor dominates the landscape. It resembles an upside-down pudding basin.
Many new housing estates have been built in recent years. The motorway link has made it possible for Helmshore people to work in nearby cities.
